info.title: Datasaham.io API
info.description:
## Tentang

Datasaham.io API adalah layanan RESTful API komprehensif untuk analisis pasar saham Indonesia (IDX). Dibangun dengan prinsip clean architecture, API ini menyediakan data pasar real-time, analitik canggih, dan insight trading yang cerdas.

## üåç Global Market Data API

Butuh data pasar global? Kunjungi **[OHLC.dev](https://ohlc.dev)** - API kami untuk data pasar global:
- **Stocks**: US, EU, Asia markets (NYSE, NASDAQ, LSE, TSE, dll)
- **Crypto**: Bitcoin, Ethereum, dan 1000+ altcoins
- **Forex**: Major, minor, dan exotic pairs
- **Commodities**: Gold, Silver, Oil, Natural Gas, dll
- **Indices**: S&P 500, NASDAQ, Dow Jones, FTSE, Nikkei, dll

‚û°Ô∏è **[https://ohlc.dev](https://ohlc.dev)** - Real-time & historical OHLCV data untuk global markets

## Fitur Utama

### üìÖ Calendar
Kalender aksi korporasi - dividen, stock split, IPO, RUPS, dan corporate actions lainnya

### üîç Main
Endpoint umum - pencarian saham, trending stocks, dan informasi pasar

### üåç Global Market
Data pasar global - indeks dunia, komoditas, forex, dan analisis dampaknya terhadap IDX

### üìä Chart
Data OHLCV dan chart - daily, weekly, monthly, dan intraday (15m, 30m, 1h, 2h, 3h, 4h)

### üè¢ Sectors
Data sektor dan subsektor - performa sektor, daftar perusahaan per sektor

### üìà Movers
Market movers - top gainer, top loser, top value, top volume, net foreign buy/sell

### üéØ Market Detector
Analisis aktivitas broker - broker activity, top broker, top stock, broker summary

### üé∞ Bandarmology
Analisis bandar/market maker - deteksi akumulasi, distribusi, smart money flow, pump & dump

### üíé Retail Opportunity
Peluang untuk retail investor - multibagger scanner, breakout alerts, risk-reward calculator, sector rotation

### üìâ Market Sentiment
Analisis sentimen pasar - retail vs bandar sentiment, IPO momentum tracker

### üî¨ Advanced Analytics
Analitik lanjutan - correlation matrix, whale transaction detector, insider screening, technical analyst, global screener

### üèõÔ∏è Emiten
Informasi emiten - profil perusahaan, data keuangan, broker summary, insider trading, tradebook chart

### üß™ BETA
Fitur eksperimental - insights, earnings, equities, key ratios (data dari Datasaham.io)

## Autentikasi

Semua endpoint API memerlukan autentikasi menggunakan API key. Sertakan API key Anda di request header:

```
x-api-key: your_api_key_here
```

## Rate Limiting

Request API dibatasi berdasarkan tier langganan Anda. Cek response headers untuk penggunaan saat ini:
- `X-RateLimit-Limit` - Maksimum request yang diizinkan
- `X-RateLimit-Remaining` - Sisa request dalam window saat ini
- `X-RateLimit-Reset` - Waktu reset rate limit

get.description: Get API information and links to documentation. Visit /swagger for full interactive documentation.

Get detailed health status of all system components:
                
**Checks:**
- API status
- Database connection (PostgreSQL)
- Redis cache connection
- System information (memory, uptime, Node version)
- Response times for each service

**Status Values:**
- `healthy`: All services are operational
- `degraded`: One or more services are experiencing issues
- `unhealthy`: Critical services are down

Get bonus share distributions with ratio, cum date, ex date, and payment date
Get stock split events with split ratio, cum date, ex date, and recording date
Get rights issue offerings with price, ratio, trading period, and subscription dates
Get warrant listings with exercise price, trading period, and exercise period
Get General Meeting of Shareholders (RUPS) schedule with date, time, venue, and eligible date
Get Initial Public Offering schedule with listing date, offering period, price, and shares
Get economic indicators and events with actual, previous, and forecast values
Get tender offer schedule with offer period, price, shares, and payment date
Get all corporate action events happening today including dividend, bonus, stock split, right issue, warrant, RUPS, IPO, economic events, and tender offers
Get Open, High, Low, Close, Volume (OHLCV) chart data for a stock symbol with specified timeframe

get.description:
Get market mover data including top gainers, top losers, top value, top volume, and IEP-IEV data.
                    
**Regular Mover Types:**
- `top-gainer` - Stocks with highest percentage gain
- `top-loser` - Stocks with highest percentage loss
- `top-value` - Stocks with highest trading value
- `top-volume` - Stocks with highest trading volume
- `top-frequency` - Stocks with highest trading frequency
- `net-foreign-buy` - Stocks with highest net foreign buy
- `net-foreign-sell` - Stocks with highest net foreign sell

**IEP-IEV Mover Types (Special Monitoring Board):**
- `iep-current-top-gainer` - IEP current top gainer
- `iep-current-top-loser` - IEP current top loser
- `iep-prev-top-gainer` - IEP previous top gainer
- `iep-prev-top-loser` - IEP previous top loser
- `iev-top-gainer` - IEV top gainer
- `iev-top-loser` - IEV top loser
- `ieval-top-gainer` - IEVAL top gainer
- `ieval-top-loser` - IEVAL top loser

**Filter Stocks:**
- `FILTER_STOCKS_TYPE_MAIN_BOARD` - Main board stocks
- `FILTER_STOCKS_TYPE_DEVELOPMENT_BOARD` - Development board stocks
- `FILTER_STOCKS_TYPE_ACCELERATION_BOARD` - Acceleration board stocks
- `FILTER_STOCKS_TYPE_NEW_ECONOMY_BOARD` - New economy board stocks
- `FILTER_STOCKS_TYPE_SPECIAL_MONITORING_BOARD` - Special monitoring board (for IEP-IEV)
Get detailed information about a stock/emiten including price, volume, sector, and market data

Get real-time running trade data with filters (NO CACHE - Real-time)

schema.description:
Item ID untuk metric finansial (berlaku sama untuk semua symbol).
Gunakan /api/emiten/fundachart/metrics untuk daftar lengkap.
Contoh populer:
‚Ä¢ 2661 = PE Ratio (TTM)
‚Ä¢ 2891 = PBV (Price to Book Value)
‚Ä¢ 1458 = EPS (TTM)
‚Ä¢ 1466 = ROE (TTM)
‚Ä¢ 1464 = ROA (TTM)
‚Ä¢ 2538 = Free Cash Flow (TTM)
‚Ä¢ 1508 = Debt to Equity Ratio
Stock symbol, bisa multiple dengan comma separator

Get company financial statements including Income Statement, Balance Sheet, and Cash Flow with various statement types (Quarterly, Annual, TTM, Growth rates, etc.)

**Report Type (report_type):**
- 1 = Income Statement (Laporan Laba Rugi)
- 2 = Balance Sheet (Neraca)
- 3 = Cash Flow (Arus Kas)

**Statement Type (statement_type):**
- 1 = Quarterly (Kuartalan)
- 2 = Annual (Tahunan)
- 3 = TTM (Trailing Twelve Months)
- 4 = Interim YTD (Year to Date)
- 5 = Q1 (Kuartal 1)
- 6 = Q2 (Kuartal 2)
- 7 = Q3 (Kuartal 3)
- 8 = Q4 (Kuartal 4)
- 9 = QoQ Growth (Quarter over Quarter)
- 10 = Quarter YoY Growth
- 11 = YTD YoY Growth
- 12 = Annual YoY Growth
- 13 = 3 Year CAGR

anyOf.description: Data type (default: 1 = standard financial data)

get.description:
Scan for stocks with potential 2x-10x returns based on multiple factors:

**Scoring Factors:**
- Technical Analysis (25%): Price position vs 52-week range, trend direction
- Volume Analysis (20%): Volume surge, unusual volume detection
- Foreign Flow (25%): Net foreign accumulation, consecutive buy days
- Bandar Accumulation (30%): Market maker activity, accumulation status

**Output includes:**
- Multibagger score (0-100)
- Potential return estimate (e.g., "2x-5x")
- Entry zone with ideal and max prices
- Target prices with probabilities
- Risk level and stop loss recommendation

**Use Cases:**
- Find undervalued stocks with high growth potential
- Identify stocks being accumulated by smart money
- Screen for breakout candidates

schema.description: Skor minimum multibagger (0-100). Semakin tinggi skor, semakin potensial saham menjadi multibagger. Default: 50

anyOf.description: Skor minimum multibagger (0-100). Semakin tinggi skor, semakin potensial saham menjadi multibagger. Default: 50

schema.description: Jumlah maksimal hasil yang ditampilkan. Range: 1-50. Default: 20

anyOf.description: Jumlah maksimal hasil yang ditampilkan. Range: 1-50. Default: 20

get.description:
Real-time alerts for stocks that are breaking out or about to break out.

**Alert Types:**
- `VOLUME_BREAKOUT`: High volume surge with price movement
- `PRICE_BREAKOUT`: Breaking above resistance level
- `RESISTANCE_TEST`: Approaching resistance with momentum
- `SUPPORT_TEST`: Testing support level with volume

**Severity Levels:**
- `HIGH`: Strong breakout signal, immediate action recommended
- `MEDIUM`: Moderate signal, prepare for entry
- `LOW`: Early signal, monitor closely

**Output includes:**
- Alert type and severity
- Volume vs average comparison
- Support and resistance levels
- Breakout probability
- Entry trigger conditions
- Target and stop loss levels

**Use Cases:**
- Catch breakouts early for momentum trading
- Identify stocks with unusual volume activity
- Get real-time trading signals

Calculate risk-reward ratio and position sizing for a stock.

**Technical Analysis:**
- Support and resistance levels (3 levels each)
- Pivot points (Classic formula)
- ATR (Average True Range) for volatility

**Risk-Reward Calculation:**
- Stop loss recommendation based on support and ATR
- Multiple target prices with probabilities
- Risk-reward ratio for each target

**Position Sizing:**
- Maximum position as % of portfolio
- Suggested number of shares
- Total investment amount
- Maximum loss amount

**Recommendation Levels:**
- `EXCELLENT_SETUP`: R:R >= 3:1
- `GOOD_SETUP`: R:R >= 2:1
- `FAIR_SETUP`: R:R >= 1.5:1
- `POOR_SETUP`: R:R < 1.5:1

**Use Cases:**
- Plan entry and exit before trading
- Calculate proper position size
- Manage risk effectively

schema.description: Jumlah hari untuk analisis historis. Range: 7-90 hari. Default: 30 hari

anyOf.description: Jumlah hari untuk analisis historis. Range: 7-90 hari. Default: 30 hari

schema.description: Ukuran portfolio dalam Rupiah untuk kalkulasi position sizing. Minimum: Rp 1.000.000. Default: Rp 100.000.000

anyOf.description: Ukuran portfolio dalam Rupiah untuk kalkulasi position sizing. Minimum: Rp 1.000.000. Default: Rp 100.000.000

schema.description: Persentase risiko maksimal per trade. Range: 0.5-10%. Default: 2%

anyOf.description: Persentase risiko maksimal per trade. Range: 0.5-10%. Default: 2%

get.description:
Analyze sector rotation to identify hot and cold sectors for timing entry/exit.

**Market Phase Detection:**
- `EARLY_EXPANSION`: Market starting to recover
- `LATE_EXPANSION`: Market in full bull mode
- `EARLY_CONTRACTION`: Market starting to weaken
- `LATE_CONTRACTION`: Market in full bear mode
- `NEUTRAL`: No clear direction

**Sector Status:**
- `LEADING`: Strong momentum, outperforming market
- `IMPROVING`: Gaining momentum, potential leader
- `WEAKENING`: Losing momentum, potential laggard
- `LAGGING`: Weak momentum, underperforming market

**Sector Recommendations:**
- `OVERWEIGHT`: Increase allocation to this sector
- `NEUTRAL`: Maintain current allocation
- `UNDERWEIGHT`: Reduce allocation to this sector

**Output includes:**
- Hot sectors (momentum score >= 6)
- Cold sectors (momentum score < 4)
- All sectors with detailed metrics
- Top stocks per sector
- Foreign flow estimation
- Market phase summary

**Use Cases:**
- Identify sectors to focus on
- Time sector rotation trades
- Understand market cycle position

Analyze sentiment divergence between retail traders and institutional investors (bandar).

**Retail Sentiment Indicators:**
- `frequency_score`: Trading frequency (higher = more retail activity)
- `small_lot_percentage`: Percentage of small lot transactions
- `fomo_score`: Fear of missing out indicator
- `volume_participation`: Retail volume participation

**Retail Status:**
- `EUPHORIC`: Extreme bullish, high FOMO (DANGER - potential top)
- `BULLISH`: Positive sentiment
- `NEUTRAL`: No clear direction
- `FEARFUL`: Negative sentiment
- `PANIC`: Extreme bearish (potential bottom)

**Bandar Sentiment Indicators:**
- `top_broker_net_flow`: Net flow from top 5 brokers
- `large_lot_percentage`: Percentage of large lot transactions
- `accumulation_score`: Accumulation/distribution score
- `foreign_flow`: Foreign investor net flow
- `institutional_flow`: Institutional (Pemerintah) net flow

**Bandar Status:**
- `ACCUMULATING`: Smart money buying
- `HOLDING`: Maintaining positions
- `NEUTRAL`: No clear direction
- `DISTRIBUTING`: Smart money selling
- `EXITING`: Smart money exiting

**Divergence Types:**
- `RETAIL_EUPHORIC_BANDAR_EXIT`: ‚ö†Ô∏è DANGER - Retail FOMO while bandar exits
- `RETAIL_PANIC_BANDAR_ACCUMULATE`: üéØ OPPORTUNITY - Retail panic while bandar accumulates
- `ALIGNED_BULLISH`: Both bullish - strong momentum
- `ALIGNED_BEARISH`: Both bearish - strong downtrend
- `NEUTRAL`: No significant divergence

**Use Cases:**
- Identify potential market tops (retail euphoria + bandar exit)
- Find buying opportunities (retail panic + bandar accumulation)
- Confirm trend strength (aligned sentiment)

schema.description: Jumlah hari untuk analisis sentiment. Range: 1-30 hari. Default: 7 hari

anyOf.description: Jumlah hari untuk analisis sentiment. Range: 1-30 hari. Default: 7 hari

get.description:
Track and analyze IPO momentum for trading opportunities.

**IPO Momentum Score (0-10):**
Based on multiple factors:
- Market condition (bullish/bearish)
- Underwriter quality (Tier 1/2/3)
- Price attractiveness
- Offering size

**Underwriter Tiers:**
- `TIER_1`: Major securities (Mandiri, BCA, Trimegah, Indo Premier, etc.)
- `TIER_2`: Mid-tier securities (Henan Putihrai, Sucor, Samuel, etc.)
- `TIER_3`: Smaller securities

**IPO Status:**
- `UPCOMING`: Not yet in offering period
- `OFFERING`: Currently in offering period
- `LISTED`: Already listed on exchange
- `PAST`: Listed more than 30 days ago

**Strategy Recommendations:**
- `STRONG_APPLY`: High momentum, apply for allocation
- `APPLY`: Good momentum, consider applying
- `CONSIDER`: Moderate momentum, evaluate carefully
- `AVOID`: Low momentum, high risk

**Output includes:**
- Upcoming IPOs with momentum analysis
- Recent IPOs (within 30 days) with performance
- Market sentiment assessment
- Hot sectors identification

**Use Cases:**
- Identify high-potential IPOs for allocation
- Track recent IPO performance
- Time IPO trading strategies

Calculate price correlation between multiple stocks for portfolio diversification analysis.

**Correlation Values:**
- `1.0`: Perfect positive correlation (move together)
- `0.0`: No correlation (independent movement)
- `-1.0`: Perfect negative correlation (move opposite)

**Correlation Strength:**
- `STRONG_POSITIVE`: >= 0.7 (avoid holding together)
- `MODERATE_POSITIVE`: 0.3 to 0.7
- `WEAK`: -0.3 to 0.3 (good for diversification)
- `MODERATE_NEGATIVE`: -0.7 to -0.3
- `STRONG_NEGATIVE`: <= -0.7 (good for hedging)

**Output includes:**
- NxN correlation matrix
- All unique pairs with correlation values
- Insights: highly correlated, inversely correlated, uncorrelated pairs
- Per-symbol analysis with average correlation
- Trading implications and recommendations

**Use Cases:**
- Portfolio diversification analysis
- Identify hedging opportunities
- Sector correlation analysis
- Risk management

schema.description: Stock symbols dipisahkan koma untuk menghitung korelasi antar saham
Jumlah hari untuk kalkulasi korelasi. Range: 7-365 hari. Default: 30 hari

anyOf.description: Jumlah hari untuk kalkulasi korelasi. Range: 7-365 hari. Default: 30 hari

get.description:
Detect and analyze large institutional transactions (whale activity).

**Whale Types:**
- `MEGA_WHALE`: >= 10x minimum lot threshold
- `LARGE_WHALE`: >= 3x minimum lot threshold
- `MEDIUM_WHALE`: >= minimum lot threshold

**Whale Activity Summary:**
- Total whale buy/sell value
- Net whale flow
- Dominant action (ACCUMULATION/DISTRIBUTION/NEUTRAL)
- Whale intensity (EXTREME/HIGH/MODERATE/LOW)

**Top Whale Brokers:**
- Broker code and type (Asing/Lokal/Pemerintah)
- Net value and lot
- Whale score (0-10)
- Action (ACCUMULATING/DISTRIBUTING)

**Prediction:**
- Short-term direction (BULLISH/BEARISH/NEUTRAL)
- Confidence level (0-100%)
- Reasoning

**Alerts:**
- Mega whale transactions
- Extreme activity warnings
- Foreign flow alerts
- Accumulation/Distribution signals

**Use Cases:**
- Follow smart money
- Detect institutional accumulation/distribution
- Time entry/exit based on whale activity
- Monitor foreign investor flow

schema.description: Minimum lot threshold untuk deteksi transaksi whale. Range: 100-10.000 lot. Default: 500 lot

anyOf.description: Minimum lot threshold untuk deteksi transaksi whale. Range: 100-10.000 lot. Default: 500 lot

get.description:
Screen insider/major holder activity across all stocks with various filters.

**Flow yang direkomendasikan:**
1. Scan semua saham tanpa symbol untuk cari insider activity
2. Filter by min_ownership >= 5% untuk cari insider dengan kepemilikan signifikan
3. Filter by min_percentage >= 1% untuk cari perubahan signifikan
4. Filter by source KSEI (data bulanan, lebih akurat untuk akumulasi)
5. Filter by period (misal 2025-12 untuk Desember 2025)
6. Setelah dapat symbol, gunakan endpoint /insider-net/:symbols untuk total akumulasi

**Filters:**
- `symbols`: Comma-separated symbols (optional - kosongkan untuk scan semua)
- `min_percentage`: Filter insider dengan PERUBAHAN kepemilikan >= X%
- `min_ownership`: Filter insider dengan KEPEMILIKAN SAAT INI >= X% (misal 5 untuk >= 5%)
- `source_type`: SOURCE_TYPE_KSEI (bulanan) atau SOURCE_TYPE_IDX (harian)
- `action_type`: ACTION_TYPE_BUY atau ACTION_TYPE_SELL
- `period`: Format YYYY-MM atau YYYY-MM-DD

**Output:**
- Summary: total movements, buy/sell count, net value, dominant action
- Top Symbols: saham dengan insider activity terbesar
- Top Insiders: insider dengan activity terbesar
- Movements: detail setiap transaksi
- Alerts: notifikasi untuk activity signifikan

**Alert Types:**
- LARGE_ACCUMULATION: Akumulasi >= 1%
- LARGE_DISTRIBUTION: Distribusi >= 1%
- NEW_POSITION: Insider buka posisi baru
- SIGNIFICANT_CHANGE: Kepemilikan >= 5%

**Use Cases:**
- Cari saham yang sedang diakumulasi insider
- Monitor aktivitas komisaris/direktur
- Deteksi perubahan kepemilikan signifikan
- Follow smart money dari data KSEI

schema.description: Stock symbols dipisahkan koma (opsional - kosongkan untuk scan semua saham)
Filter insider dengan PERUBAHAN kepemilikan >= X%. Minimum: 0%

anyOf.description: Filter insider dengan PERUBAHAN kepemilikan >= X%. Minimum: 0%

schema.description: Filter insider dengan KEPEMILIKAN SAAT INI >= X%. Minimum: 0%

anyOf.description: Filter insider dengan KEPEMILIKAN SAAT INI >= X%. Minimum: 0%

Filter by action type: BUY, SELL, CROSS (crossing), TRANSFER, CORPACTION (corporate action)

schema.description: Jumlah item per halaman. Range: 1-100. Default: 100

anyOf.description: Jumlah item per halaman. Range: 1-100. Default: 100

get.description:
Calculate total net buy/sell summary for specific symbols.

**Use Case:**
Setelah menemukan saham dari insider-screening, gunakan endpoint ini untuk melihat total akumulasi/distribusi per symbol.

**Filters:**
- `date_start`: Filter dari tanggal (YYYY-MM-DD)
- `date_end`: Filter sampai tanggal (YYYY-MM-DD)

**Output:**
- Per symbol: total buy, total sell, net shares, net value
- Per insider: detail aktivitas setiap insider
- Overall: total net value dan dominant action

**Example:**
1. Dari insider-screening, dapat BUMI, ADRO, BBCA yang ada insider activity
2. Panggil /insider-net/BUMI,ADRO,BBCA?date_start=2025-11-01&date_end=2025-11-30
3. Lihat mana yang net buy terbesar di bulan November

schema.description: Comma-separated stock symbols untuk hitung total net buy/sell

get.description:
Comprehensive technical analysis with multiple indicators.

**Available Indicators (use 'indicators' query param):**
- `sma`: Simple Moving Average (5, 10, 20, 50, 200)
- `ema`: Exponential Moving Average (5, 10, 20, 50, 200)
- `rsi`: Relative Strength Index (14 period)
- `macd`: MACD with signal line and histogram
- `stochastic`: Stochastic Oscillator (%K, %D)
- `bollinger`: Bollinger Bands with %B
- `atr`: Average True Range
- `obv`: On-Balance Volume
- `vwap`: Volume Weighted Average Price
- `trend`: Trend analysis (short/medium/long term)
- `support_resistance`: Support & resistance levels
- `signal`: Trading signal recommendation
- `all`: All indicators (default)

**Example Usage:**
- All indicators: `/technical/BBCA`
- Only RSI & MACD: `/technical/BBCA?indicators=rsi,macd`
- Moving averages & trend: `/technical/BBCA?indicators=sma,ema,trend`

**Timeframes:**
- `daily`: Daily candles (default)
- `15m`, `30m`, `1h`, `2h`, `3h`, `4h`: Intraday candles

**Trading Signal:**
- Action: STRONG_BUY, BUY, HOLD, SELL, STRONG_SELL
- Confidence level (0-100%)
- Detailed reasoning

anyOf.description: Number of candles to analyze (default: 100)

schema.description: Comma-separated indicators to calculate. Options: sma,ema,rsi,macd,stochastic,bollinger,atr,obv,vwap,trend,support_resistance,signal. Default: all

get.description:
Screen IDX stocks based on global market factors (commodities, forex).

**Commodity Exposure Filter:**
- `Coal`: ADRO, PTBA, ITMG, BUMI
- `Oil`: MEDC, ELSA
- `Gold`: ANTM, MDKA
- `Nickel`: ANTM, INCO, NCKL
- `CPO`: AALI, LSIP
- `Tin`: TINS
- `Copper`: TPIA

**Forex Exposure Filter:**
- `exporter`: Stocks that benefit from IDR weakening (ADRO, PTBA, ANTM, INCO, AALI)
- `importer`: Stocks that benefit from IDR strengthening (ASII, UNVR, ICBP)

**Output:**
- Stock list with global factor impact analysis
- Commodity impact: positive/negative/neutral based on commodity price movement
- Forex impact: positive/negative/neutral based on USD/IDR movement
- Overall score combining all factors
- Global context: current commodity prices and forex rates

**Use Cases:**
- Find stocks benefiting from commodity rally
- Screen exporters when IDR is weakening
- Portfolio construction based on global factors

schema.description: Filter by commodity exposure (comma-separated): Coal, Oil, Gold, Nickel, CPO, Tin, Copper

anyOf.description: Minimum stock price filter
Maximum stock price filter
Minimum volume filter

Get USD/IDR rate and its impact on IDX stocks (importers vs exporters)
Monitor US parent/related companies of IDX stocks (e.g., GOTO ‚Üí Alibaba, BUKA ‚Üí Microsoft)

get.description:
Mendapatkan insights/analisis saham dari Datasaham.io.

**Data yang tersedia:**
- Valuation (P/E ratio, P/S ratio, analyst rating, price target)
- Earnings (EPS growth, revenue growth, quarterly performance)
- Growth (forecast EPS, forecast revenue)
- Performance (profit margin, revenue growth 3Y, earnings growth)
- Health (current ratio, quick ratio, debt to equity, ROE)

**Response:**
- Summary dengan skor (good - bad)
- Insights dikelompokkan per kategori
- Perbandingan dengan peers dan industri
- Raw data untuk analisis lanjutan

**Catatan:** Fitur BETA - mungkin berubah tanpa pemberitahuan.

schema.description: Kode saham IDX (contoh: TLKM, BBCA, BBRI)

get.description:
Mendapatkan data earnings/laba saham dari Datasaham.io.

**Data yang tersedia:**
- EPS (Earnings Per Share) aktual dan forecast
- Revenue aktual dan forecast
- Earnings surprise (selisih aktual vs forecast)
- Jadwal rilis laporan keuangan
- Historical earnings (annual & quarterly)

**Response:**
- Summary (EPS & revenue tahun lalu)
- Latest actual earnings dengan surprise
- Forecast annual & quarterly
- Historical data annual & quarterly

**Catatan:** Fitur BETA - mungkin berubah tanpa pemberitahuan.

schema.description: Kode saham IDX (contoh: TLKM, BBCA, BBRI)

get.description:
Mendapatkan data keuangan/equities saham dari Datasaham.io.

**Data yang tersedia:**
- EPS, Revenue, Net Income
- Profit Margin, ROE, ROA
- Debt to Equity Ratio
- P/E Ratio, P/B Ratio
- Book Value Per Share
- Assets, Liabilities, Long Term Debt
- Shares Outstanding

**Response:**
- Latest financials summary
- Year-over-year trends (growth)
- Historical annual statements

**Catatan:** Fitur BETA - mungkin berubah tanpa pemberitahuan.

schema.description: Kode saham IDX (contoh: TLKM, BBCA, BBRI)

get.description:
Mendapatkan key ratios saham dari Datasaham.io dengan perbandingan industri.

**Data yang tersedia:**
- Valuation Ratios (P/E, P/B, P/S)
- Profitability (ROE, ROIC, Gross Margin, Operating Margin, Net Margin)
- Liquidity (Current Ratio, Quick Ratio)
- Leverage (Debt to Equity)
- Per Share Data (EPS, Book Value, Revenue)

**Response:**
- Comparison: stock vs industry ratios
- Historical stock metrics (annual & quarterly)
- Industry benchmark metrics

**Catatan:** Fitur BETA - mungkin berubah tanpa pemberitahuan.

schema.description: Kode saham IDX (contoh: TLKM, BBCA, BBRI)
